name: WHEN the APOD endpoint is tested with no data available for a date MUST response with an error
fullName: Gonkey.WHEN the APOD endpoint is tested with no data available for a date MUST response with an error
description: Test the APOD endpoint with a date for which no data is available to verify that the service returns an error from https://api.nasa.gov/planetary/apod
descriptionHtml: Test the APOD endpoint with a date for which no data is available to verify that the service returns an error from https://api.nasa.gov/planetary/apod
